sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnmtgplacefxtrs ( MTGRUM_ID /* */ , FXTRS_CODE /* */ , QY /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #mtgrumId# /* */ , #fxtrsCode# /* */ , #qy# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnmtgplacefxtrs SET MTGRUM_ID=#mtgrumId# /* */ , FXTRS_CODE=#fxtrsCode# /* */ , QY=#qy# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE MTGRUM_ID=#mtgrumId# /* */ AND FXTRS_CODE=#fxtrsCode# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnmtgplacefxtrs WHERE MTGRUM_ID=#mtgrumId# /* */ AND FXTRS_CODE=#fxtrsCode# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT MTGRUM_ID /* */ , FXTRS_CODE /* */ , QY /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnmtgplacefxtrs WHERE MTGRUM_ID=#mtgrumId# /* */ AND FXTRS_CODE=#fxtrsCode# /* */

SELECT MTGRUM_ID /* */ , FXTRS_CODE /* */ , QY /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnmtgplacefxtrs WHERE 1=1
MTGRUM_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
FXTRS_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY MTGRUM_ID DESC /* */ , FXTRS_CODE DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnmtgplacefxtrs WHERE 1=1
MTGRUM_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
FXTRS_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
